Access Denied You don\'t have permission to access leads. You don\'t have permission to edit leads. You don\'t have permission to access contracts. You don\'t have permission to edit contracts. You don\'t have permission to access work orders. You don\'t have permission to access invoices. You don\'t have permission to edit invoices. You don\'t have permission to access images. You don\'t have permission to access customers. You don\'t have permission to edit customers. You don\'t have permission to access employees. You don\'t have permission to edit employees. You don\'t have permission to access items. You don\'t have permission to edit items. You don\'t have permission to access vendors. You don\'t have permission to edit vendors. You don\'t have permission to access equipment. You don\'t have permission to edit equipment. You don\'t have permission to add payroll. You don\'t have permission to edit work orders. You don\'t have permission to create invoices. You don\'t have permission to access crews. You don\'t have permission to access departments. You don\'t have permission to edit crews. An invoice can only be made from a finished work order. An invoice can\'t be made from a batch or no invoice work order. An invoice can\'t be made from a work order with no price. An invoiced work order can\'t be edited.

Error PHP Error Warning Delete Item? Are you sure you want to delete this item? Reset Shift? Are you sure you want to reset this shift? Only Item You cannot delete the only item. Usage Exists You must delete any usage before deleting this item. Add Item? The customer may have already seen this contract. Are you sure you want to add an item? Fields Missing Please fill out all the fields before submitting. Update Equipment? You marked a question to "bad", do you want to update equipment status? You marked a question to "bad", do you want to update equipment status? No Vendors We do not have any registered vendors in our system. Reason for Skip: No phone number on record No Phone Number %1$s has no phone number on file. No Employees Selected Select some recipients. Message is Empty Please enter a message. Send %1$s text(s)? Send %1$d texts? (batch %2$d of %3$d) Stop Batching? Selecting or deselecting employees will stop the batch text currently in process. Are you sure you wish to proceed? System Name Too Long The system name can have a maximum of 41 characters. Incomplete Customer Please provide a system name. Billing Name Too Long The billing name can have a maximum of 31 characters. Unsaved Changes Go back without saving? Incomplete Lead Select a customer. Select an appointment date. Could Not Find Employee Could not find your employee ID in the active employees list, and cannot add payroll. You may be set to inactive. Incomplete Work Order Provide a title. Incomplete Contract Select a sales rep. Delete Contact? Are you sure you want to delete this contact? Incomplete Contact Provide a name. Provide a value. Start time cannot be after stop time. Stop time cannot be before start time. That crew already has time set. Delete Crew? Are you sure you want to delete this crew\'s planned time? Please select a crew for all planned dates.
You cannot delete the only equipment field. You cannot delete "other" and "N/A" equipment fields.

Please let us know what happened so we can continue to improve our app experience. Thank you! Adminmatic has encountered a server warning. Would you like to submit a bug report? Not Now Continue
